s_synopsis: Stay alert! Don't blink! You're in the fight of your life. The defense of Planet Earth against the Dark Squadron hangs on your hair-trigger shooting and superior strategy. But win or lose, you and your 80-ton lazer gunship are going to make things HOT. Increase destructive capabilities by powering up, and battle your way to the Supreme Alien Leader. What you do to him if you catch him won't be pretty!
